pitch.english: Use to trim if the heli drifts in one of the stabilized modes (angle, horizon, etc.).
pitch.translation: Use to trim if the Heli drifts in one of the stabilized modes (angle, horizon, etc.).

roll.english: Use to trim if the heli drifts in one of the stabilized modes (angle, horizon, etc.).
roll.translation: Use to trim if the Heli drifts in one of the stabilized modes (angle, horizon, etc.).

batteryCapacity.english: The milliamp hour capacity of your battery.
batteryCapacity.translation: The milliamp hour Capacidade of your Bateria.

batteryCellCount.english: The number of cells in your battery.
batteryCellCount.translation: The number of Celdas in your Bateria.

vbatfullcellvoltage.english: The nominal voltage of a fully charged cell.
vbatfullcellvoltage.translation: The nominal Tensao of a fully charged Celda.

vbatmaxcellvoltage.english: The maximum voltage per cell before the high voltage alarm is triggered.
vbatmaxcellvoltage.translation: The Max voltage per cell before the Alto voltage alarm is triggered.

vbatmincellvoltage.english: The minimum voltage per cell before the low voltage alarm is triggered.
vbatmincellvoltage.translation: The Min voltage per cell before the Baixo voltage alarm is triggered.

vbatwarningcellvoltage.english: The voltage per cell at which the low voltage alarm will start to sound.
vbatwarningcellvoltage.translation: The voltage per cell at which the Baixo voltage alarm will Iniciar to sound.

sag_multiplier.english: Raise or lower to adjust for the amount of voltage sag you see in flight.
sag_multiplier.translation: Raise or lower to adjust for the amount of Tensao Queda you see in Voo.

cell_count.english: Number of cells in the battery
cell_count.translation: Number of Celdas in the Bateria

current_gain.english: Gain value for the current sensor
current_gain.translation: Ganho Valor for the current Sensor

low_voltage_protection.english: Voltage at which we cut power by 50%
low_voltage_protection.translation: Tensao at which we cut Potencia by 50%

temperature_protection.english: Temperature at which we cut power by 50%
temperature_protection.translation: Temperature at which we cut Potencia by 50%

half_duplex.english: Half duplex mode for ESC telemetry
half_duplex.translation: Half duplex Modo for ESC telemetry

pin_swap.english: Swap the TX and RX pins for the ESC telemetry
pin_swap.translation: Troca the TX and RX pins for the ESC Telemetria

dyn_notch_max_hz.english: Maximum frequency to which the notch is applied.
dyn_notch_max_hz.translation: Max Frequencia to which the notch is applied.

dyn_notch_min_hz.english: Minimum frequency to which the notch is applied.
dyn_notch_min_hz.translation: Min Frequencia to which the notch is applied.

dyn_notch_q.english: Quality factor of the notch filter.
dyn_notch_q.translation: Quality factor of the notch filter.

gyro_lpf1_dyn_max_hz.english: Dynamic filter max cutoff in Hz.
gyro_lpf1_dyn_max_hz.translation: Dynamic filter Max Corte in Hz.

gyro_lpf1_dyn_min_hz.english: Dynamic filter min cutoff in Hz.
gyro_lpf1_dyn_min_hz.translation: Dynamic filter Min Corte in Hz.

gyro_lpf1_static_hz.english: Lowpass filter cutoff frequency in Hz.
gyro_lpf1_static_hz.translation: Lowpass filter Corte Frequencia in Hz.

gyro_lpf2_static_hz.english: Lowpass filter cutoff frequency in Hz.
gyro_lpf2_static_hz.translation: Lowpass filter Corte Frequencia in Hz.

gyro_soft_notch_cutoff_1.english: Width of the notch filter in Hz.
gyro_soft_notch_cutoff_1.translation: Width of the notch filter in Hz.

gyro_soft_notch_cutoff_2.english: Width of the notch filter in Hz.
gyro_soft_notch_cutoff_2.translation: Width of the notch filter in Hz.

gyro_soft_notch_hz_1.english: Center frequency to which the notch is applied.
gyro_soft_notch_hz_1.translation: Center Frequencia to which the notch is applied.

gyro_soft_notch_hz_2.english: Center frequency to which the notch is applied.
gyro_soft_notch_hz_2.translation: Center Frequencia to which the notch is applied.

rpm_min_hz.english: Minimum frequency for the RPM filter.
rpm_min_hz.translation: Min Frequencia for the RPM filter.

gov_handover_throttle.english: Governor activates above this %. Below this the input throttle is passed to the ESC.
gov_handover_throttle.translation: Governor activates above this %. Below this the Entrada throttle is passed to the ESC.

gov_recovery_time.english: Time constant for recovery spoolup, in seconds, measuring the time from zero to full headspeed.
gov_recovery_time.translation: Tempo constant for recovery spoolup, in seconds, measuring the Tempo from zero to full headspeed.

gov_spoolup_min_throttle.english: Minimum throttle to use for slow spoolup, in percent. For electric motors the default is 5%, for nitro this should be set so the clutch starts to engage for a smooth spoolup 10-15%.
gov_spoolup_min_throttle.translation: Min throttle to use for slow spoolup, in percent. For electric motors the Padrao is 5%, for nitro this should be set so the clutch starts to engage for a Suave spoolup 10-15%.

gov_spoolup_time.english: Time constant for slow spoolup, in seconds, measuring the time from zero to full headspeed.
gov_spoolup_time.translation: Tempo constant for slow spoolup, in seconds, measuring the Tempo from zero to full headspeed.

gov_startup_time.english: Time constant for slow startup, in seconds, measuring the time from zero to full headspeed.
gov_startup_time.translation: Tempo constant for slow startup, in seconds, measuring the Tempo from zero to full headspeed.

gov_tracking_time.english: Time constant for headspeed changes, in seconds, measuring the time from zero to full headspeed.
gov_tracking_time.translation: Tempo constant for headspeed changes, in seconds, measuring the Tempo from zero to full headspeed.

governor_collective_ff_weight.english: Collective precompensation weight - how much collective is mixed into the feedforward.
governor_collective_ff_weight.translation: Collective precompensation weight - how much collective is mixed into the Feedforward.

governor_cyclic_ff_weight.english: Cyclic precompensation weight - how much cyclic is mixed into the feedforward.
governor_cyclic_ff_weight.translation: Cyclic precompensation weight - how much cyclic is mixed into the Feedforward.

governor_headspeed.english: Target headspeed for the current profile.
governor_headspeed.translation: Target headspeed for the Corrente profile.

governor_max_throttle.english: Maximum output throttle the governor is allowed to use.
governor_max_throttle.translation: Max Saida throttle the Governor is allowed to use.

governor_min_throttle.english: Minimum output throttle the governor is allowed to use.
governor_min_throttle.translation: Min Saida throttle the Governor is allowed to use.

governor_tta_gain.english: TTA gain applied to increase headspeed to control the tail in the negative direction (e.g. motorised tail less than idle speed).
governor_tta_gain.translation: TTA Ganho applied to increase headspeed to control the tail in the negative Direcao (e.g. motorised tail less than idle Veloc).

governor_tta_limit.english: TTA max headspeed increase over full headspeed.
governor_tta_limit.translation: TTA Max headspeed increase over full headspeed.

governor_yaw_ff_weight.english: Yaw precompensation weight - how much yaw is mixed into the feedforward.
governor_yaw_ff_weight.translation: Yaw precompensation weight - how much Yaw is mixed into the Feedforward.

collective_tilt_correction_neg.english: Adjust the collective tilt correction scaling for negative collective pitch.
collective_tilt_correction_neg.translation: Adjust the collective tilt correction scaling for negative collective Pitch.

collective_tilt_correction_pos.english: Adjust the collective tilt correction scaling for positive collective pitch.
collective_tilt_correction_pos.translation: Adjust the collective tilt correction scaling for positive collective Pitch.

swash_geo_correction.english: Adjust if there is too much negative collective or too much positive collective.
swash_geo_correction.translation: Adjust if there is too much negative Coletivo or too much positive Coletivo.

swash_phase.english: Phase offset for the swashplate controls.
swash_phase.translation: Phase offset for the swashplate controls.

swash_pitch_limit.english: Maximum amount of combined cyclic and collective blade pitch.
swash_pitch_limit.translation: Max amount of combined cyclic and collective blade Pitch.

swash_trim_0.english: Swash trim to level the swash plate when using fixed links.
swash_trim_0.translation: Swash trim to Nivel the swash plate when using Fixa links.

swash_trim_1.english: Swash trim to level the swash plate when using fixed links.
swash_trim_1.translation: Swash trim to Nivel the swash plate when using Fixa links.

swash_trim_2.english: Swash trim to level the swash plate when using fixed links.
swash_trim_2.translation: Swash trim to Nivel the swash plate when using Fixa links.

tail_center_trim.english: Sets tail rotor trim for 0 yaw for variable pitch, or tail motor throttle for 0 yaw for motorized.
tail_center_trim.translation: Sets tail rotor trim for 0 Yaw for Variavel Pitch, or tail Motor throttle for 0 Yaw for motorized.

tail_motor_idle.english: Minimum throttle signal sent to the tail motor. This should be set just high enough that the motor does not stop.
tail_motor_idle.translation: Min throttle signal sent to the tail Motor. This should be set just Alto enough that the Motor does not stop.

maxthrottle.english: This PWM value is sent to the ESC/Servo at full throttle
maxthrottle.translation: This PWM Valor is sent to the ESC/Servo at full throttle

mincommand.english: This PWM value is sent when the motor is stopped
mincommand.translation: This PWM Valor is sent when the Motor is stopped

minthrottle.english: This PWM value is sent to the ESC/Servo at low throttle
minthrottle.translation: This PWM Valor is sent to the ESC/Servo at Baixo throttle

motor_pole_count_0.english: The number of magnets on the motor bell.
motor_pole_count_0.translation: The number of magnets Lig the Motor bell.

motor_pwm_protocol.english: The protocol used to communicate with the ESC
motor_pwm_protocol.translation: The Protocolo used to communicate with the ESC

motor_pwm_rate.english: The frequency at which the ESC sends PWM signals to the motor
motor_pwm_rate.translation: The Frequencia at which the ESC sends PWM signals to the Motor

angle_level_limit.english: Limit the maximum angle the helicopter will pitch/roll to while in Angle mode.
angle_level_limit.translation: Limite the Max angle the helicopter will Pitch/Roll to while in Angle Modo.

angle_level_strength.english: Determines how aggressively the helicopter tilts back to level while in Angle Mode.
angle_level_strength.translation: Determines how aggressively the helicopter tilts back to Nivel while in Angle Modo.

cyclic_cross_coupling_cutoff.english: Frequency limit for the compensation. Higher value will make the compensation action faster.
cyclic_cross_coupling_cutoff.translation: Frequencia Limite for the compensation. Higher Valor will make the compensation action faster.

cyclic_cross_coupling_gain.english: Amount of compensation applied for pitch-to-roll decoupling.
cyclic_cross_coupling_gain.translation: Amount of compensation applied for Pitch-to-Roll decoupling.

cyclic_cross_coupling_ratio.english: Amount of roll-to-pitch compensation needed, vs. pitch-to-roll.
cyclic_cross_coupling_ratio.translation: Amount of Roll-to-Pitch compensation needed, vs. Pitch-to-Roll.

error_decay_limit_cyclic.english: Maximum bleed-off speed for cyclic I-term.
error_decay_limit_cyclic.translation: Max bleed-Desl Veloc for cyclic termo I.

error_decay_time_cyclic.english: Time constant for bleeding off cyclic I-term. Higher will stabilize hover, lower will drift.
error_decay_time_cyclic.translation: Tempo constant for bleeding Desl cyclic termo I. Higher will stabilize hover, lower will drift.

error_decay_time_ground.english: Bleeds off the current controller error when the craft is not airborne to stop the craft tipping over.
error_decay_time_ground.translation: Bleeds Desl the current controller error when the craft is not airborne to stop the craft tipping over.

error_limit_0.english: Hard limit for the angle error in the PID loop. The absolute error and thus the I-term will never go above these limits.
error_limit_0.translation: Duro Limite for the angle error in the laco PID. The absolute error and thus the termo I will never go above these limits.

error_limit_1.english: Hard limit for the angle error in the PID loop. The absolute error and thus the I-term will never go above these limits.
error_limit_1.translation: Duro Limite for the angle error in the laco PID. The absolute error and thus the termo I will never go above these limits.

error_limit_2.english: Hard limit for the angle error in the PID loop. The absolute error and thus the I-term will never go above these limits.
error_limit_2.translation: Duro Limite for the angle error in the laco PID. The absolute error and thus the termo I will never go above these limits.

error_rotation.english: Rotates the current roll and pitch error terms around yaw when the craft rotates. This is sometimes called Piro Compensation.
error_rotation.translation: Rotates the current Roll and Pitch error terms around Yaw when the craft rotates. This is sometimes called Piro Compensation.

gyro_cutoff_0.english: PID loop overall bandwidth in Hz.
gyro_cutoff_0.translation: laco PID overall bandwidth in Hz.

gyro_cutoff_1.english: PID loop overall bandwidth in Hz.
gyro_cutoff_1.translation: laco PID overall bandwidth in Hz.

gyro_cutoff_2.english: PID loop overall bandwidth in Hz.
gyro_cutoff_2.translation: laco PID overall bandwidth in Hz.

horizon_level_strength.english: Determines how aggressively the helicopter tilts back to level while in Horizon Mode.
horizon_level_strength.translation: Determines how aggressively the helicopter tilts back to Nivel while in Horizon Modo.

iterm_relax_cutoff_0.english: Helps reduce bounce back after fast stick movements. Can cause inconsistency in small stick movements if too low.
iterm_relax_cutoff_0.translation: Helps reduce bounce back after fast Stick movements. Can cause inconsistency in Peq Stick movements if too Baixo.

iterm_relax_cutoff_1.english: Helps reduce bounce back after fast stick movements. Can cause inconsistency in small stick movements if too low.
iterm_relax_cutoff_1.translation: Helps reduce bounce back after fast Stick movements. Can cause inconsistency in Peq Stick movements if too Baixo.

iterm_relax_cutoff_2.english: Helps reduce bounce back after fast stick movements. Can cause inconsistency in small stick movements if too low.
iterm_relax_cutoff_2.translation: Helps reduce bounce back after fast Stick movements. Can cause inconsistency in Peq Stick movements if too Baixo.

iterm_relax_type.english: Choose the axes in which this is active. RP: Roll, Pitch. RPY: Roll, Pitch, Yaw.
iterm_relax_type.translation: Choose the axes in which this is Ativo. RP: Roll, Pitch. RPY: Roll, Pitch, Yaw.

offset_limit_0.english: Hard limit for the High Speed Integral offset angle in the PID loop. The O-term will never go over these limits.
offset_limit_0.translation: Duro Limite for the Alto Veloc Integral offset angle in the laco PID. The O-term will never go over these limits.

offset_limit_1.english: Hard limit for the High Speed Integral offset angle in the PID loop. The O-term will never go over these limits.
offset_limit_1.translation: Duro Limite for the Alto Veloc Integral offset angle in the laco PID. The O-term will never go over these limits.

pitch_collective_ff_gain.english: Increasing will compensate for the pitching up motion caused by tail drag when climbing.
pitch_collective_ff_gain.translation: Increasing will compensate for the pitching up motion caused by Cauda drag when climbing.

trainer_angle_limit.english: Limit the maximum angle the helicopter will pitch/roll to while in Acro Trainer Mode.
trainer_angle_limit.translation: Limite the Max angle the helicopter will Pitch/Roll to while in Acro Trainer Modo.

trainer_gain.english: Determines how aggressively the helicopter tilts back to the maximum angle (if exceeded) while in Acro Trainer Mode.
trainer_gain.translation: Determines how aggressively the helicopter tilts back to the Max angle (if exceeded) while in Acro Trainer Modo.

yaw_collective_dynamic_decay.english: Decay time for the extra yaw precomp on collective input.
yaw_collective_dynamic_decay.translation: Decay Tempo for the extra Yaw precomp Lig collective Entrada.

yaw_collective_dynamic_gain.english: An extra boost of yaw precomp on collective input.
yaw_collective_dynamic_gain.translation: An extra boost of Yaw precomp Lig collective Entrada.

yaw_collective_ff_gain.english: Collective feedforward mixed into yaw (collective-to-yaw precomp).
yaw_collective_ff_gain.translation: Collective Feedforward mixed into Yaw (collective-to-Yaw precomp).

yaw_cyclic_ff_gain.english: Cyclic feedforward mixed into yaw (cyclic-to-yaw precomp).
yaw_cyclic_ff_gain.translation: Cyclic Feedforward mixed into Yaw (cyclic-to-Yaw precomp).

yaw_inertia_precomp_cutoff.english: Cutoff. Derivative cutoff frequency in 1/10Hz steps. Controls how sharp the precomp is. Higher value is sharper.
yaw_inertia_precomp_cutoff.translation: Corte. Derivative Corte Frequencia in 1/10Hz steps. Controls how sharp the precomp is. Higher Valor is sharper.

yaw_inertia_precomp_gain.english: Scalar gain. The strength of the main rotor inertia. Higher value means more precomp is applied to yaw control.
yaw_inertia_precomp_gain.translation: Scalar Ganho. The strength of the main rotor inertia. Higher Valor means more precomp is applied to Yaw control.

yaw_precomp_cutoff.english: Frequency limit for all yaw precompensation actions.
yaw_precomp_cutoff.translation: Frequencia Limite for all Yaw precompensation actions.

pid_0_B.english: Additional boost on the feedforward to make the heli react more to quick stick movements.
pid_0_B.translation: Additional boost Lig the Feedforward to make the Heli react more to quick Stick movements.

pid_0_D.english: Strength of dampening to any motion on the system, including external influences. Also reduces overshoot.
pid_0_D.translation: Strength of dampening to any motion Lig the system, including external influences. Also reduces overshoot.

pid_0_F.english: Helps push P-term based on stick input. Increasing will make response more sharp, but can cause overshoot.
pid_0_F.translation: Helps push termo P based Lig Stick Entrada. Increasing will make response more sharp, but can cause overshoot.

pid_0_I.english: How tightly the system holds its position.
pid_0_I.translation: How tightly the Sistema holds its position.

pid_0_O.english: Used to prevent the craft from rolling when using high collective.
pid_0_O.translation: Used to prevent the craft from rolling when using Alto collective.

pid_0_P.english: How tightly the system tracks the desired setpoint.
pid_0_P.translation: How tightly the Sistema tracks the desired setpoint.

pid_1_B.english: Additional boost on the feedforward to make the heli react more to quick stick movements.
pid_1_B.translation: Additional boost Lig the Feedforward to make the Heli react more to quick Stick movements.

pid_1_D.english: Strength of dampening to any motion on the system, including external influences. Also reduces overshoot.
pid_1_D.translation: Strength of dampening to any motion Lig the system, including external influences. Also reduces overshoot.

pid_1_F.english: Helps push P-term based on stick input. Increasing will make response more sharp, but can cause overshoot.
pid_1_F.translation: Helps push termo P based Lig Stick Entrada. Increasing will make response more sharp, but can cause overshoot.

pid_1_I.english: How tightly the system holds its position.
pid_1_I.translation: How tightly the Sistema holds its position.

pid_1_O.english: Used to prevent the craft from pitching when using high collective.
pid_1_O.translation: Used to prevent the craft from pitching when using Alto collective.

pid_1_P.english: How tightly the system tracks the desired setpoint.
pid_1_P.translation: How tightly the Sistema tracks the desired setpoint.

pid_2_B.english: Additional boost on the feedforward to make the heli react more to quick stick movements.
pid_2_B.translation: Additional boost Lig the Feedforward to make the Heli react more to quick Stick movements.

pid_2_D.english: Strength of dampening to any motion on the system, including external influences. Also reduces overshoot.
pid_2_D.translation: Strength of dampening to any motion Lig the system, including external influences. Also reduces overshoot.

pid_2_F.english: Helps push P-term based on stick input. Increasing will make response more sharp, but can cause overshoot.
pid_2_F.translation: Helps push termo P based Lig Stick Entrada. Increasing will make response more sharp, but can cause overshoot.

pid_2_I.english: How tightly the system holds its position.
pid_2_I.translation: How tightly the Sistema holds its position.

pid_2_P.english: How tightly the system tracks the desired setpoint.
pid_2_P.translation: How tightly the Sistema tracks the desired setpoint.

model_param1_value.english: Set this to the expected flight time in seconds.  The transmitter will beep when the flight time is reached.
model_param1_value.translation: Set this to the expected flight Tempo in seconds.  The transmitter will beep when the flight Tempo is reached.

rc_arm_throttle.english: Throttle must be at or below this value in microseconds (us) to allow arming. Must be at least 10us lower than minimum throttle.
rc_arm_throttle.translation: Throttle must be at or below this Valor in microseconds (us) to allow Arm. Must be at least 10us lower than Min throttle.

rc_deadband.english: Deadband for cyclic control in microseconds (us).
rc_deadband.translation: Zona morta for Ciclico control in microseconds (us).

rc_deflection.english: Stick deflection from center in microseconds (us).
rc_deflection.translation: Stick Deflex from center in microseconds (us).

rc_max_throttle.english: Maximum throttle (100% throttle output) expected from radio, in microseconds (us).
rc_max_throttle.translation: Max throttle (100% throttle Saida) expected from radio, in microseconds (us).

rc_min_throttle.english: Minimum throttle (0% throttle output) expected from radio, in microseconds (us).
rc_min_throttle.translation: Min throttle (0% throttle Saida) expected from radio, in microseconds (us).

rc_yaw_deadband.english: Deadband for yaw control in microseconds (us).
rc_yaw_deadband.translation: Deadband for Yaw control in microseconds (us).

accel_limit_1.english: Maximum acceleration of the craft in response to a stick movement.
accel_limit_1.translation: Max acceleration of the craft in response to a Stick movement.

accel_limit_2.english: Maximum acceleration of the craft in response to a stick movement.
accel_limit_2.translation: Max acceleration of the craft in response to a Stick movement.

accel_limit_3.english: Maximum acceleration of the craft in response to a stick movement.
accel_limit_3.translation: Max acceleration of the craft in response to a Stick movement.

accel_limit_4.english: Maximum acceleration of the craft in response to a stick movement.
accel_limit_4.translation: Max acceleration of the craft in response to a Stick movement.

response_time_1.english: Increase or decrease the response time of the rate to smooth heli movements.
response_time_1.translation: Increase or decrease the response Tempo of the Taxa to Suave Heli movements.

response_time_2.english: Increase or decrease the response time of the rate to smooth heli movements.
response_time_2.translation: Increase or decrease the response Tempo of the Taxa to Suave Heli movements.

response_time_3.english: Increase or decrease the response time of the rate to smooth heli movements.
response_time_3.translation: Increase or decrease the response Tempo of the Taxa to Suave Heli movements.

response_time_4.english: Increase or decrease the response time of the rate to smooth heli movements.
response_time_4.translation: Increase or decrease the response Tempo of the Taxa to Suave Heli movements.

yaw_dynamic_ceiling_gain.english: The maximum gain applied to the yaw dynamic ceiling.
yaw_dynamic_ceiling_gain.translation: The Max Ganho applied to the Yaw dynamic ceiling.

yaw_dynamic_deadband_filter.english: The maximum filter applied to the yaw dynamic deadband.
yaw_dynamic_deadband_filter.translation: The Max filter applied to the Yaw dynamic deadband.

yaw_dynamic_deadband_gain.english: The maximum gain applied to the yaw dynamic deadband.
yaw_dynamic_deadband_gain.translation: The Max Ganho applied to the Yaw dynamic deadband.

rescue_climb_time.english: Length of time the climb collective is applied before switching to hover.
rescue_climb_time.translation: Duracao of Tempo the climb collective is applied before switching to hover.

rescue_exit_time.english: This limits rapid application of negative collective if the helicopter has rolled during rescue.
rescue_exit_time.translation: This Limites rapid application of negative collective if the helicopter has rolled during rescue.

rescue_flip_gain.english: Determine how aggressively the heli flips during inverted rescue.
rescue_flip_gain.translation: Determine how aggressively the Heli flips during inverted rescue.

rescue_flip_mode.english: If rescue is activated while inverted, flip to upright - or remain inverted.
rescue_flip_mode.translation: If rescue is activated while inverted, flip to upright - or remain inverted.

rescue_flip_time.english: If the helicopter is in rescue and is trying to flip to upright and does not within this time, rescue will be aborted.
rescue_flip_time.translation: If the helicopter is in rescue and is trying to flip to upright and does not within this Tempo, rescue will be aborted.

rescue_level_gain.english: Determine how aggressively the heli levels during rescue.
rescue_level_gain.translation: Determine how aggressively the Heli levels during rescue.

rescue_max_setpoint_accel.english: Limit how fast the helicopter accelerates into a roll/pitch. Larger helicopters may need slower acceleration.
rescue_max_setpoint_accel.translation: Limite how fast the helicopter accelerates into a Roll/Pitch. Larger helicopters may need slower acceleration.

rescue_max_setpoint_rate.english: Limit rescue roll/pitch rate. Larger helicopters may need slower rotation rates.
rescue_max_setpoint_rate.translation: Limite rescue Roll/Pitch Taxa. Larger helicopters may need slower rotation rates.

rescue_pull_up_time.english: When rescue is activated, helicopter will apply pull-up collective for this time period before moving to flip or climb stage.
rescue_pull_up_time.translation: When rescue is activated, helicopter will Aplicar pull-up collective for this Tempo period before moving to flip or climb stage.

help_p1.english: The accelerometer is used to measure the angle of the flight controller in relation to the horizon. This data is used to stabilize the aircraft and provide self-leveling functionality.
help_p1.translation: The accelerometer is used to measure the angle of the flight controller in relation to the horizon. This Dados is used to stabilize the aircraft and provide self-leveling functionality.

help_p1.english: Copy PID profile or Rate profile from Source to Destination.
help_p1.translation: Copy PID profile or Taxa profile from Fonte to Destination.

help_p2.english: Choose the source and destinations and save to copy the profile.
help_p2.translation: Choose the Fonte and destinations and save to copy the profile.

msgbox_msg.english: Save current page to flight controller?

help_p1.english: Configure the motor and speed controller features.
help_p1.translation: Configure the Motor and Veloc controller features.

extra_msg_save.english: Please reboot the ESC to apply the changes
extra_msg_save.translation: Please reboot the ESC to Aplicar the changes

erase_prompt.english: Would you like to erase the dataflash?
erase_prompt.translation: Would you like to erase the dataflash?

help_p1.english: Typically you would not edit this page without checking your Blackbox logs!
help_p1.translation: Typically you would not edit this page without checking your Blackbox logs!

help_p2.english: Gyro lowpass: Lowpass filters for the gyro signal. Typically left at default.
help_p2.translation: Gyro lowpass: Lowpass filters for the gyro signal. Typically left at Padrao.

help_p3.english: Gyro notch filters: Use for filtering specific frequency ranges. Typically not needed in most helis.
help_p3.translation: Gyro notch filters: Use for filtering specific Frequencia ranges. Typically not needed in most helis.

help_p4.english: Dynamic Notch Filters: Automatically creates notch filters within the min and max frequency range.
help_p4.translation: Dynamic Notch Filters: Automatically creates notch filters within the Min and Max Frequencia range.

help_p1.english: These parameters apply globally to the governor regardless of the profile in use.
help_p1.translation: These parameters Aplicar globally to the Governor regardless of the profile in use.

help_p2.english: Each parameter is simply a time value in seconds for each governor action.
help_p2.translation: Each parameter is simply a Tempo Valor in seconds for each Governor action.

help_logs_p1.english: Please select a log file from the list below.
help_logs_p1.translation: Please select a Log file from the list below.

help_logs_p2.english: Note. To enable logging it is essential for you to have the following sensors enabled.
help_logs_p2.translation: Note. To Hab logging it is essential for you to have the following Sensores Hab.

help_logs_p3.english: - arm status, voltage, headspeed, current, esc temperature
help_logs_p3.translation: - arm status, Tensao, headspeed, Corrente, esc temperature

help_logs_tool_p1.english: Please use the slider to navigate the graph.
help_logs_tool_p1.translation: Please use the slider to navigate the graph.

help_p1.english: Adust swash plate geometry, phase angles, and limits.
help_p1.translation: Adust swash plate geometry, phase angles, and Limites.

help_p1.english: This tool provides the ability to send a custom byte string to the flight controller. It is useful for developers when debugging values.
help_p1.translation: This tool provides the ability to send a Custom byte string to the flight controller. It is useful for developers when debugging values.

help_p2.english: If you do not understand what you are doing, do not use it as bad things can happen.
help_p2.translation: Se voce nao entende, nao use, pode dar errado.

start_prompt.english: Would you like to start the test? Choose the test run time below.

help_p1.english: FeedForward (Roll/Pitch): Start at 70, increase until stops are sharp with no drift. Keep roll and pitch equal.
help_p1.translation: Feedforward (Roll/Pitch): Iniciar at 70, increase until stops are sharp with no drift. Keep Roll and Pitch equal.

help_p2.english: I Gain (Roll/Pitch): Raise gradually for stable piro pitch pumps. Too high causes wobbles; match roll/pitch values.
help_p2.translation: I Ganho (Roll/Pitch): Raise gradually for stable piro Pitch pumps. Too Alto causes wobbles; match Roll/Pitch values.

help_p3.english: Tail P/I/D Gains: Increase P until slight wobble in funnels, then back off slightly. Raise I until tail holds firm in hard moves (too high causes slow wag). Adjust D for smooth stops-higher for slow servos, lower for fast ones.
help_p3.translation: Tail P/I/D Gains: Increase P until slight wobble in funnels, then back Desl slightly. Raise I until tail holds firm in Duro moves (too Alto causes slow wag). Adjust D for Suave stops-higher for slow servos, lower for fast ones.

help_p4.english: Test & Adjust: Fly, observe, and fine-tune for best performance in real conditions.
help_p4.translation: Teste & Adjust: Fly, observe, and fine-tune for best Rend in real conditions.

help_p1.english: The battery settings are used to configure the flight controller to monitor the battery voltage and provide warnings when the voltage drops below a certain level.
help_p1.translation: The battery settings are used to configure the flight controller to monitor the battery voltage and provide warnings when the voltage drops below a certain Nivel.

help_p1.english: Acro Trainer: How aggressively the heli tilts back to level when flying in Acro Trainer Mode.
help_p1.translation: Acro Trainer: How aggressively the Heli tilts back to Nivel when flying in Acro Trainer Modo.

help_p2.english: Angle Mode: How aggressively the heli tilts back to level when flying in Angle Mode.
help_p2.translation: Angle Modo: How aggressively the Heli tilts back to Nivel when flying in Angle Modo.

help_p3.english: Horizon Mode: How aggressively the heli tilts back to level when flying in Horizon Mode.
help_p3.translation: Horizon Modo: How aggressively the Heli tilts back to Nivel when flying in Horizon Modo.

help_p1.english: Full headspeed: Headspeed target when at 100% throttle input.
help_p1.translation: Full headspeed: Headspeed target when at 100% throttle Entrada.

help_p2.english: PID master gain: How hard the governor works to hold the RPM.
help_p2.translation: PID Mestre Ganho: How Duro the Governor works to hold the RPM.

help_p3.english: Gains: Fine tuning of the governor.
help_p3.translation: Gains: Fine tuning of the Governor.

help_p4.english: Precomp: Governor precomp gain for yaw, cyclic, and collective inputs.
help_p4.translation: Precomp: Governor precomp Ganho for Yaw, cyclic, and collective inputs.

help_p5.english: Max throttle: The maximum throttle % the governor is allowed to use.
help_p5.translation: Max throttle: The Max throttle % the Governor is allowed to use.

help_p6.english: Tail Torque Assist: For motorized tails. Gain and limit of headspeed increase when using main rotor torque for yaw assist.
help_p6.translation: Tail Torque Assist: For motorized tails. Ganho and Limite of headspeed increase when using main rotor torque for Yaw assist.

help_p1.english: Collective Pitch Compensation: Increasing will compensate for the pitching motion caused by tail drag when climbing.
help_p1.translation: Collective Pitch Compens: Increasing will compensate for the pitching motion caused by tail drag when climbing.

help_p2.english: Cross Coupling Gain: Removes roll coupling when only elevator is applied.
help_p2.translation: Cross Coupling Ganho: Removes Roll coupling when only elevator is applied.

help_p3.english: Cross Coupling Ratio: Amount of compensation (pitch vs roll) to apply.
help_p3.translation: Cross Coupling Ratio: Amount of compensation (Pitch vs Roll) to Aplicar.

help_p4.english: Cross Coupling Freq. Limit: Frequency limit for the compensation, higher value will make the compensation action faster.
help_p4.translation: Cross Coupling Freq. Limite: Frequencia Limite for the compensation, higher Valor will make the compensation action faster.

help_p1.english: PID Bandwidth: Overall bandwidth in HZ used by the PID loop.
help_p1.translation: PID Bandwidth: Overall bandwidth in HZ used by the laco PID.

help_p2.english: D-term cutoff: D-term cutoff frequency in HZ.
help_p2.translation: termo D Corte: termo D Corte Frequencia in HZ.

help_p3.english: B-term cutoff: B-term cutoff frequency in HZ.
help_p3.translation: B-term Corte: B-term Corte Frequencia in HZ.

help_p1.english: Error decay ground: PID decay to help prevent heli from tipping over when on the ground.
help_p1.translation: Error decay ground: PID decay to Ajuda prevent Heli from tipping over when Lig the ground.

help_p2.english: Error limit: Angle limit for I-term.
help_p2.translation: Error Limite: Angle Limite for termo I.

help_p3.english: Offset limit: Angle limit for High Speed Integral (O-term).
help_p3.translation: Offset Limite: Angle Limite for Alto Veloc Integral (O-term).

help_p4.english: Error rotation: Allow errors to be shared between all axes.
help_p4.translation: Error rotation: Allow Erros to be shared between all axes.

help_p5.english: I-term relax: Limit accumulation of I-term during fast movements - helps reduce bounce back after fast stick movements. Generally needs to be lower for large helis and can be higher for small helis. Best to only reduce as much as is needed for your flying style.
help_p5.translation: termo I relax: Limite accumulation of termo I during fast movements - helps reduce bounce back after fast Stick movements. Generally needs to be lower for Grande helis and can be higher for Peq helis. Best to only reduce as much as is needed for your flying Estilo.

help_p1.english: Flip to upright: Flip the heli upright when rescue is activated.
help_p1.translation: Flip to upright: Flip the Heli upright when rescue is activated.

help_p2.english: Pull-up: How much collective and for how long to arrest the fall.
help_p2.translation: Pull-up: How much Coletivo and for how long to arrest the fall.

help_p3.english: Climb: How much collective to maintain a steady climb - and how long.
help_p3.translation: Climb: How much Coletivo to maintain a steady climb - and how long.

help_p4.english: Hover: How much collective to maintain a steady hover.
help_p4.translation: Hover: How much Coletivo to maintain a steady hover.

help_p5.english: Flip: How long to wait before aborting because the flip did not work.
help_p5.translation: Flip: How long to wait before aborting because the flip did not work.

help_p6.english: Gains: How hard to fight to keep heli level when engaging rescue mode.
help_p6.translation: Gains: How Duro to fight to keep Heli Nivel when engaging rescue Modo.

help_p7.english: Rate and Accel: Max rotation and acceleration rates when leveling during rescue.
help_p7.translation: Taxa and Acel: Max rotation and acceleration rates when leveling during rescue.

help_p1.english: Set the current flight profile or rate profile you would like to use.
help_p1.translation: Set the current flight profile or Taxa profile you would like to use.

help_p2.english: If you use a switch on your radio to change flight or rate modes, this will override this choice as soon as you toggle the switch.
help_p2.translation: If you use a switch Lig your radio to change flight or Taxa modes, this will override this choice as soon as you toggle the switch.

save_prompt.english: Save current page to flight controller?

help_p1.english: Yaw Stop Gain: Higher stop gain will make the tail stop more aggressively but may cause oscillations if too high. Adjust CW or CCW to make the yaw stops even.
help_p1.translation: Yaw Stop Ganho: Higher stop Ganho will make the tail stop more aggressively but may cause oscillations if too Alto. Adjust CW or CCW to make the Yaw stops even.

help_p2.english: Precomp Cutoff: Frequency limit for all yaw precompensation actions.
help_p2.translation: Precomp Corte: Frequencia Limite for all Yaw precompensation actions.

help_p3.english: Cyclic FF Gain: Tail precompensation for cyclic inputs.
help_p3.translation: Cyclic FF Ganho: Tail precompensation for cyclic inputs.

help_p4.english: Collective FF Gain: Tail precompensation for collective inputs.
help_p4.translation: Collective FF Ganho: Tail precompensation for collective inputs.

help_p5.english: Collective Impulse FF: Impulse tail precompensation for collective inputs. If you need extra tail precompensation at the beginning of collective input.
help_p5.translation: Collective Impulse FF: Impulse tail precompensation for collective inputs. If you need extra tail precompensation at the beginning of collective Entrada.

help_p1.english: Configure your radio settings. Stick center, arm, throttle hold, and throttle cut.
help_p1.translation: Configure your radio settings. Stick center, arm, Acel hold, and Acel cut.

help_default_p1.english: Default: We keep this to make button appear for rates.
help_default_p1.translation: Padrao: We keep this to make button appear for rates.

help_default_p2.english: We will use the sub keys below.
help_default_p2.translation: We will use the sub keys Abaixo.

help_table_0_p1.english: All values are set to zero because no RATE TABLE is in use.
help_table_0_p1.translation: All values are set to zero because no TAXA TABELA is in use.

help_table_1_p1.english: RC Rate: Maximum rotation rate at full stick deflection.
help_table_1_p1.translation: RC Taxa: Max rotation Taxa at full Stick Deflex.

help_table_1_p2.english: SuperRate: Increases maximum rotation rate while reducing sensitivity around half stick.
help_table_1_p2.translation: SuperRate: Increases Max rotation Taxa while reducing sensitivity around half Stick.

help_table_1_p3.english: Expo: Reduces sensitivity near the stick's center where fine controls are needed.
help_table_1_p3.translation: Expo: Reduces sensitivity near the Stick's center where fine controls are needed.

help_table_2_p1.english: Rate: Maximum rotation rate at full stick deflection in degrees per second.
help_table_2_p1.translation: Taxa: Max rotation Taxa at full Stick Deflex in degrees per second.

help_table_2_p2.english: Acro+: Increases the maximum rotation rate while reducing sensitivity around half stick.
help_table_2_p2.translation: Acro+: Increases the Max rotation Taxa while reducing sensitivity around half Stick.

help_table_2_p3.english: Expo: Reduces sensitivity near the stick's center where fine controls are needed.
help_table_2_p3.translation: Expo: Reduces sensitivity near the Stick's center where fine controls are needed.

help_table_3_p1.english: RC Rate: Maximum rotation rate at full stick deflection.
help_table_3_p1.translation: RC Taxa: Max rotation Taxa at full Stick Deflex.

help_table_3_p2.english: Rate: Increases maximum rotation rate while reducing sensitivity around half stick.
help_table_3_p2.translation: Taxa: Increases Max rotation Taxa while reducing sensitivity around half Stick.

help_table_3_p3.english: RC Curve: Reduces sensitivity near the stick's center where fine controls are needed.
help_table_3_p3.translation: RC Curva: Reduces sensitivity near the Stick's center where fine controls are needed.

help_table_4_p1.english: Center Sensitivity: Use to reduce sensitivity around center stick. Set Center Sensitivity to the same as Max Rate for a linear response. A lower number than Max Rate will reduce sensitivity around center stick. Note that higher than Max Rate will increase the Max Rate - not recommended as it causes issues in the Blackbox log.
help_table_4_p1.translation: Center Sensitivity: Use to reduce sensitivity around center Stick. Set Center Sensitivity to the same as Max Taxa for a linear response. A lower number than Max Taxa will reduce sensitivity around center Stick. Note that higher than Max Taxa will increase the Max Taxa - not recommended as it causes issues in the Blackbox Log.

help_table_4_p2.english: Max Rate: Maximum rotation rate at full stick deflection in degrees per second.
help_table_4_p2.translation: Max Taxa: Max rotation Taxa at full Stick Deflex in degrees per second.

help_table_4_p3.english: Expo: Reduces sensitivity near the stick's center where fine controls are needed.
help_table_4_p3.translation: Expo: Reduces sensitivity near the Stick's center where fine controls are needed.

help_table_5_p1.english: RC Rate: Use to reduce sensitivity around center stick. RC Rate set to one half of the Max Rate is linear. A lower number will reduce sensitivity around center stick. Higher than one half of the Max Rate will also increase the Max Rate.
help_table_5_p1.translation: RC Taxa: Use to reduce sensitivity around center Stick. RC Taxa set to one half of the Max Taxa is linear. A lower number will reduce sensitivity around center Stick. Higher than one half of the Max Taxa will also increase the Max Taxa.

help_table_5_p2.english: Max Rate: Maximum rotation rate at full stick deflection in degrees per second.
help_table_5_p2.translation: Max Taxa: Max rotation Taxa at full Stick Deflex in degrees per second.

help_table_5_p3.english: Expo: Reduces sensitivity near the stick's center where fine controls are needed.
help_table_5_p3.translation: Expo: Reduces sensitivity near the Stick's center where fine controls are needed.

help_table_6_p1.english: Rate: Maximum rotation rate at full stick deflection in degrees per second.
help_table_6_p1.translation: Taxa: Max rotation Taxa at full Stick Deflex in degrees per second.

help_table_6_p2.english: Shape: Shifts the vertex of the control curve. Up to this point, the signal translation is linear. This defines how far the stick travel remains proportional before the curve becomes progressive.
help_table_6_p2.translation: Shape: Shifts the vertex of the control Curva. Up to this point, the signal translation is linear. This defines how far the Stick travel remains Proporcional before the Curva becomes progressive.

help_table_6_p3.english: Expo: Reduces sensitivity near the stick's center where fine controls are needed.
help_table_6_p3.translation: Expo: Reduces sensitivity near the Stick's center where fine controls are needed.

help_p1.english: Rates type: Choose the rate type you prefer flying with. Raceflight and Actual are the most straightforward.
help_p1.translation: Rates Tipo: Choose the Taxa Tipo you prefer flying with. Raceflight and Actual are the most straightforward.

help_p2.english: Dynamics: Applied regardless of rates type. Typically left on defaults but can be adjusted to smooth heli movements, like with scale helis.
help_p2.translation: Dynamics: Applied regardless of rates Tipo. Typically left Lig defaults but can be adjusted to Suave Heli movements, like with scale helis.

msg_reset_to_defaults.english: Rate type changed. Values will be reset to defaults.
msg_reset_to_defaults.translation: Taxa Tipo changed. Values will be Reset to defaults.

disable_servo_override_msg.english: Return control of the servos to the flight controller.
disable_servo_override_msg.translation: Return control of the servos to the Voo controller.

enable_servo_override_msg.english: Servo override allows you to 'trim' your servo center point in real time.
enable_servo_override_msg.translation: Servo override allows you to 'trim' your servo center point in real Tempo.

help_default_p1.english: Please select the servo you would like to configure from the list below.
help_default_p1.translation: Please select the Servo you would like to configure from the list below.

help_default_p2.english: Primary flight controls that use the rotorflight mixer will display in the section called 'mixer'.
help_default_p2.translation: Primary flight controls that use the rotorflight Mixer will Tela in the section called 'Mixer'.

help_default_p3.english: Any other servos that are not controlled by the primary flight mixer will be displayed in the section called 'Other servos'.
help_default_p3.translation: Any other servos that are not controlled by the primary flight Mixer will be displayed in the section called 'Other servos'.

help_fields_flags.english: 0 = Default, 1=Reverse, 2 = Geo Correction, 3 = Reverse + Geo Correction
help_fields_flags.translation: 0 = Padrao, 1=Invert, 2 = Geo Correction, 3 = Invert + Geo Correction

help_tool_p1.english: Override: [*] Enable override to allow real-time updates of servo center point.
help_tool_p1.translation: Override: [*] Hab override to allow real-Tempo updates of servo center point.

help_tool_p2.english: Center: Adjust the center position of the servo.
help_tool_p2.translation: Center: Adjust the center position of the Servo.

help_tool_p3.english: Minimum/Maximum: Adjust the end points of the selected servo.
help_tool_p3.translation: Min/Max: Adjust the end points of the selected servo.

help_tool_p4.english: Scale: Adjust the amount the servo moves for a given input.
help_tool_p4.translation: Scale: Adjust the amount the servo moves for a given Entrada.

help_tool_p5.english: Rate: The frequency the servo runs best at - check with manufacturer.
help_tool_p5.translation: Taxa: The Frequencia the servo runs best at - check with manufacturer.

help_tool_p6.english: Speed: The speed the servo moves. Generally only used for the cyclic servos to help the swash move evenly. Optional - leave all at 0 if unsure.
help_tool_p6.translation: Veloc: The Veloc the servo moves. Generally only used for the cyclic servos to Ajuda the swash move evenly. Optional - leave all at 0 if unsure.

help_modelAnnouncement.english: Model announcement requires a .wav file in the 'audio' folder matching the model name (e.g. 'racer.wav' for model 'racer').
help_modelAnnouncement.translation: Model announcement requires a .wav file in the 'Audio' folder matching the model name (e.g. 'racer.wav' for model 'racer').

help_audio_events.english: Use this section to configure which system events and telemetry values will trigger voice announcements or alerts.
help_audio_events.translation: Here you can configure which system events and telemetry values trigger voice announcements or alerts.

no_themes_available_to_configure.english: No configurable themes installed on this device
no_themes_available_to_configure.translation: No configurable themes installed Lig this device

help_p1.english: Use this module to update the recorded flight statistics on the flight controller.
help_p1.translation: Use this module to Update the recorded flight statistics Lig the flight controller.

no_more_than_40.english: No more than 40 sensors can be enabled at once
no_more_than_40.translation: No more than 40 Sensores can be Hab at once

disable_mixer_message.english: Return control of the servos to the flight controller.
disable_mixer_message.translation: Return control of the servos to the Voo controller.

enable_mixer_message.english:
Set all servos to their configured center position. 

This will result in all values on this page being saved when adjusting the servo trim.
enable_mixer_message.translation:
Set all servos to their configured center position. 

This will result in all values Lig this page being saved when adjusting the servo trim.

help_p1.english: This tool attempts to list all the sensors that you are not receiving in a concise list.
help_p1.translation: This tool attempts to list all the Sensores that you are not receiving in a concise list.

help_p2.english: Use this tool to ensure you are sending the correct sensors.
help_p2.translation: Use this tool to ensure you are sending the correct Sensores.

msg_repair.english: Enable required sensors on flight controller?
msg_repair.translation: Hab required Sensores Lig flight controller?

msg_repair_fin.english: The flight controller has been configured? You may need to perform a discover sensors to see the changes.
msg_repair_fin.translation: The flight controller has been configured? You may need to perform a discover Sensores to see the changes.

msg_please_disarm_to_save_warning.english: Settings will only be saved to eeprom on disarm
msg_please_disarm_to_save_warning.translation: Settings will only be saved to eeprom Lig disarm

msg_save_current_page.english: Save current page to flight controller?

reset_flight_ask_text.english: Are you sure you want to reset the flight?
reset_flight_ask_text.translation: Are you sure you want to Reset the flight?
